text:
Hello Everyone!

I am working with a client who is looking for some part time help post Pardot migration and would love to chat with anyone who is open to around 20+ hours per week! I’m happy to answer any questions you have, just ping me! :slightly_smiling_face:

HAPPY MONDAY!

Tuesday Edit - I’m currently good on candidates and have some interviews already running. If the client is still looking after those wrap up, I’ll update here!

Thank you, all!
